text: Hello, I recently reviewed “Bayesian Sampling for Semi-supervised Learning” (2015). (pursuant to GDPR Article 17) I’d like you to remove the link/connection since I withdraw consent to its processing. within 30 days. I can confirm my account details upon request. Regards,

Subject: Request for erasure  To whom it may concern,  I’m submitting a data erasure request. This concerns “Attention-based Classifiers for Graph Mining” (2018).  I am requesting erasure as my objection to processing should be honored. Please remove the related link/connection within one month. I can confirm my account details upon request.  Best,
